Third party software | LandSerf 2.3 Documentation | landserf.org

Third Party Software Details

LandSerf is Copyright Jo Wood, 1996-2009 with the exception of the following third party software:

  • IzForge's IzPack installer software. It comes with a standard Apache Licence Version 2.0.
  • Incors' Alloy Look and Feel for Java. See also their copyright statement
  • Java bindings for OpenGL - JOGL which uses the Berkeley Software Distribution Licence.
  • Serial port communication (used for GPS connection) - RXTX libraries which use the GNU Lesser General Public License.
Last Modified, 20th April, 2009
